name: github-diff-submodules
description: script to display submodule diffs in github.com diff views

scripts.build: rm -f index.html && cat github-diff-submodules.js | bookmarklet - | sed -e '1s/.*/{"bookmarklet_code": "&"}/' | cat - package.json | json --merge | mustache - index.html.mustache > index.html

author: Max F. Albrecht <1@178.is>
